title: LF OOL Team
body:
Hi, I'm looking for a team to play with for Split 2 of the Oceanic Open Ladder. Currently sitting in Diamond V, peaked Diamond I solo and Challenger flex queue. 
I main Jungle and Top, and have had previous experience with a few other teams, including playing in the OOL to OCS promotion tournament (top 8 ool, placing 4th, and winning several online tournaments).
Add me through the League of Legends client if your team has vacant positions!
IGN: Imperiuš

replies.body: Add me my man we need to talk
